Directing the Secretary of Defense to transmit to the House of Representatives the fiscal year 2010 30-year aviation plan relating to the long-term aviation plans of the Department of Defense, as required by section 231a of title 10, United States Code.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Ordered to be Reported (Amended) by Voice Vote.
Reported (Amended) by the Committee on Armed Services. H. Rept. 111-168.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 78.

bill.summary: Directs the Secretary of Defense (DOD) to transmit to the House of Representatives, no later than September 15, 2009: (1) the FY2010 30-year aviation plan relating to the long-term aviation plans of DOD; (2) the required assessment regarding the extent to which the combined aircraft forces of the Navy and Air Force, as outlined in the aviation plan, meet national security requirements; and (3) if the aircraft procurement budget is insufficient to meet plan requirements, the required assessment that describes and discusses the risks associated with the reduced force structure of aircraft.
